com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.data

Class WebCmsDataImportServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.data.WebCmsDataImportServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebCmsDataImportService

    @Service
public final class WebCmsDataImportServiceImpl
extends Object
implements WebCmsDataImportService
    Core API for importing data represented as a map into known assets. Data imports are transactional and use the default PlatformTransactionManager.
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Detail

      • importData

        @Transactional
public void importData(Map<String,Object> data)
        Description copied from interface: WebCmsDataImportService
        Import a collection of data. The data is expected to be represented as a map containing other maps. The initial keys in the data map should be the root types.
        Specified by:
        importData in interface WebCmsDataImportService
        Parameters:
        data - containing everything that should be imported

      • importData

        @Transactional
public void importData(Map<String,Object> data,
                                      String identifier)
        Description copied from interface: WebCmsDataImportService
        Import a collection of data. The data is expected to be represented as a map containing other maps. The initial keys in the data map should be the root types.

        This method takes an optional identifier for the data set being imported. The identifier usually references something like the original file that contains the import data.

        Specified by:
        importData in interface WebCmsDataImportService
        Parameters:
        data - containing everything that should be imported
        identifier - an optional identifier for the data being imported - useful for logging purposes

      • importData

        @Transactional
public void importData(WebCmsDataEntry data)
        Description copied from interface: WebCmsDataImportService
        Import a data entry. All registered WebCmsDataImporter beans will be checked to see if they support the given data set.
        Specified by:
        importData in interface WebCmsDataImportService
        Parameters:
        data - containing everything that should be imported
